title: (take 2) I think we should be using blockkit blocks instead of just pasting raw text from ask_agent
content:
=== New messages since last pass (process these) ===
[2025-12-09T20:51:48.370Z] Brent: (take 2) I think we should be using blockkit blocks instead of just pasting raw text from ask_agent into the slack bot responses. I'll try to figure out if there's some kind of resolver for text â†’ blocks.
